mapper.select:
select sb.*,cs.name siteName,cs2.name closeSiteName,b.number busNumber from tb_stop_bus sb left join tb_bus b on sb.bus_id = b.id left join tb_city_site cs on sb.site_id = cs.id left join tb_city_site cs2 on sb.close_site_id = cs2.id
b.city_id = #{cityId}
and cs.name like concat('%',#{siteName},'%')
and b.number like concat('%',#{busNumber},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into tb_stop_bus (bus_id, site_id, arrival_time, close_date_time, close_site_id, ) values (#{busId}, #{siteId}, #{arrivalTime}, #{closeDateTime}, #{closeSiteId} )
